message.content:
Here is the detailed breakdown of the information in the Executive Document Summary form, provided as a JSON file:

```json
{
  "amendmentNumber": 3,
  "contractNumber": "0000000000000000000036991",
  "parties": [
    "Indiana Family and Social Services Administration (FSSA), Office of Early Childhood and Out of School Learning (OEOCSL)",
    "River Valley Resources, Inc."
  ],
  "signatoryDate": "November 26, 2019",
  "amendmentPurpose": [
    "extend the term",
    "add consideration",
    "modify an exhibit",
    "provide the Division of Supplier Diversity (DSD) statuses"
  ],
  "extendedTermDuration": "one year",
  "terminationDate": "September 30, 2023",
  "considerationIncrease": "$388,410.00",
  "totalRemuneration": "not to exceed $1,680,850.00",
  "paymentStructure": "Exhibit 2B—Payment Structure",
  "exhibitReplacement": "Exhibit 2A—Payment Structure",
  "DSDStatuses": {
    "minorityAndWomenBusinessEnterprisesCompliance": {
      "requirements": "As required by 25 IAC 5-6-2(b)",
      "participationIncrease": "0%",
      "subcontractorDetails": {
        "type": "WBE",
        "companyName": "Lagniappe d/b/a Pip Printing",
        "phone": "(812) 288-9291",
        "percent": "0.64%"
      },
      "utilizationDate": "10/1/2019 forward",
      "scopeOfServices": "Printing and signs",
      "submissionRequirements": {
        "dueWithin": "thirty (30) days",
        "submissions": [
          "Pay Audit (submitted via WPA)",
          "emailed to WMBECompliance@idoa.IN.gov",
          "mailed to: Division of Supplier Diversity, 402 W. Washington Street Room W-462, Indianapolis, IN 46204"
        ],
        "ruleViolation": ["25 IAC 5-7-8"],
        "requestChanges": "emailed to WMBECompliance@idoa.IN.gov"
      }
    }
  }
}
```

This breakdown includes information about the amendment number, contract number, parties involved, date signed, purposes of the amendment, term extension, consideration increase, payment structure, and details regarding the Division of Supplier Diversity (DSD) statuses, including subcontractor information and compliance requirements.
